description:
Bayan Token describes itself as a shariah-compliant ERC20 token built on the Ethereum platform. A token represents the ownership of 16 hours of access to a private cloud Server. Each server reportedly has 2 GHZ of computing power, 1GB of memory, 5 GB of SSD disk, and 10GB bandwidth per month of data transfer.

name: Bayan Token
